data.title: Aircraft Museums outside of the USA (grouped by country)
data.meta_description: NOTE: ever since Wordpress had to halt using JAVA I cannot update this listing The countries are presented in alphabetical order in English and their native language is provided where practical. Locations are as accurate as possible, at times they are exact and at times they are general—with a few being very general. Amazingly, there…
data.text:
NOTE: ever since WordPress had to halt using JAVA I cannot update this listing

The countries are presented in alphabetical order in English and their native language is provided where practical. Locations are as accurate as possible, at times they are exact and at times they are general—with a few being very general. Amazingly, there are 60+ countries (including a protectorate) listed which have an incredible total of 300+ museums between them. Remember that many towns have individual static aircraft displays or memorials—so it is good to keep a weather eye when out and about!

May 2021: last update

* a post has been published, if interested please use the search window and the museum’s name

** a post is set to be published on this museum

<><><><>

<><><><>

Albania (1)

Gjirokastra Museum (no web site) at Tiranë (Tirana) International Airport

<><><><>

Argentina (República Argentina) (6)

Actualmente sede del Museo Nacional de Malvinas (no web site found) in Oliva

Estancia Santa Romana air park (no web site found) located in the Province of San Luis (Km 671 of National Road No. 7) and east of Villa Mercedes

Museo de la Aviación Naval Base Naval Puerto Belgrano, Bahia Blanca

Museo de la Aviación Naval Base Naval Puerto Belgrano, Bahia Blanca

Museo Nacional de Aeronautica Av. Eva Peron 2200, Buenos Aeries

Museo Naval de la Nación, (El) Av. Victorica y Vito Dumas, Buenos Aries

<><><><>

Australia (26)

Airways Museum & Civil Aviation Historical Society Essendon Airport, Melbourne, Victoria (rear of Building 44 and enter via the Edgar Johnston Lane)

Australian Aviation Museum [permanently shuttered] Bankstown Airport, Bankstown

Australian Army Flying Museum 25 minutes from Toowoomba (helicopters!) west from Toowoomba, through Oakey, then 4km to the Aviation Centre — 4km outside of Oakey

Australian National Aviation Museum (Moorabbin Air Museum) just west of Melbourbe-Moorabbin Airport, Second Ave and First St, Melbourne

Australia War Memorial Museum Fairbairn Ave and Anzac Pde, Canberra (Avro Lancaster and Me-262)

Aviation Heritage Museum Bull Creek Dr and Ewing Ave, Perth

B-24 Liberator Memorial Australia corner of Princess Hwy and Farm Rd, Werribee, Victoria 3030 (restoring the sole Liberator in the southern hemisphere)

Beck Musuem Aviation and Military Collection Kennedy Highway near Gallo Dr, Mareeba

Caboolture Warplane Museum Caboolture Airfield, Hangar 101, 157 McNaught Road, Caboolture Queensland 4510

Camden Museum of Aviation (closed to the public but in operation) 11 Stewart Street Harrington Park NSW 2567

Classic Jets Fighter Museum Hangar 52 Anderson Dr, Parafield Airport, South Australia

Darwin Aviation Museum southeast of Darwin International Airport, Stuart Hwy and Tate Place, Darwin

Fighter World Aviation Museum Williamtown N.S.W. eastern corner of Williamtown Airport, 500 meters north on Medowie Rd from Nelson Bay Rd, Williamtown

Fleet Air Arm Museum (Australia Museum of Flight) 489A Albatross Rd, New South Wales

Hinkler Hall of Aviation SE corner of Mount Perry Road & Young Street, Bundaberg North, Queensland Australia

Historical Aircraft Restoration Society Cnr Airport Road and Boomerang Avenue, Albion Park Rail, NSW 2527

Kingsford Smith Memorial special climate controlled hangar on Airport Drive next to the International Terminal of Brisbane Airport, Queensland (houses the Southern Cross which is the historic aircraft flown by Sir Charles Kingsford Smith on the first flight across the Pacific from California to Australia — 7250 miles in 1928)

Lake Boga Flying Boat Museum western shore of Lake Boga on Jacaranda Cres, just south of Swan Hill (PBY-5A)

Powerhouse Museum 500 Harris St, Ultimo NSW 2007 (PBY Catalina)

Qantas Founders Museum Sir Hudson Fysh Drive, Longreach Airport, Longreach QLD 4730

Queensland Air Museum northeast corner of the Caloundra Airport, Caloundra

RAAF Amberley Heritage Centre South Amberley Road (between Cunningham Hwy and Rosewood Dr behind the Defense Bank), Amberley (by appointment)

RAAF Museum Point Cook RAAF Base Point Cook, southwest of Melbourne

RAAF Wagga Heritage Centre Newton Rd and Rte 20, RAAF Base Wagga near East Wagga Wagga

Sir Reginald Ansett Transport Museum Ballarat Rd. & Riley St., Hamilton 3300

South Australian Aviation Museum Lipson St and Charlotten St, Port Adelaide

Temora Aviation Museum 1 Menzies Street, Temora NSW 2666

<><><><>

Austria (3)

Hangar-7 Aircraft Museum (purpose built architecturally artful museum at the Salzburg Airport) Wilhelm-Spacier-Straβe 7A, 5020 Salzburg

Heeresgeschichtliches Museum (oldest military museum in the world) in Vienna

Museum für Fahrzeug Technik und Luftfahrt Sulzbach 178, 4820

Barbados (1)

Barbados Concorde Experience eastern side, Grantley Adams International Airport, Christ Church

<><><><>

Belgium (België) (5)

Beauvechain Base Museum (no known web site) near Beauvechain

Brussels Air Museum Parc du Cinquantenaire 3, B-1000 Bruxelles

Musée Royal de l’Armée et d’Histoire Militaire Jubelpark 3, 1000 Brussels

Musée Spitfire (Florennes Air Base) Rue de Rohan Chabot Base J Offenberg, 5620 Florennes

Stampe en Vertongen Museum Deurne Airport, Antwerp

<><><><>

Brazil (Brasil) (2)

Museo Aeroespacial Av. Marechal Fontenelle, 2000 – Campo dos Afonsos, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Cep: 21740-000 (dozens of aircraft including a rare Fw-59 and replicas of Brazil’s aviation pioneer Alberto Santos-Dumont — a Santos-Dumont 14-bis and a Santos-Dumont Demoiselle)

Museu Asas de um Sonho TAM closed northeastern corner Francisco Pereira Lopes Airport, São Carlos (rare Savoia-Marchetti S.55 and Bf 109 among many others)

Museu Eduardo André Matarazzo [broken link] R. Almeida Pinto and R. Prof. João L de Camargo, Bebedouro

<><><><>

Bulgaria (България) (1)

Bulgarian Museum of Aviation and the Air Force (no web site) just south of the Plovdiv Airport, Plovdiv

<><><><>

Cambodia (1)

War Museum Cambodia (Siem Reap War Museum) along Airport Rd, behind Angkor Reach Hotel, Siem Reap (many rusted aircraft and missiles)

<><><><>

Canada (26)

Air Force Association of Canada south end of Kingston Airport, Balmoral Park

Air Force Heritage Museum and Air Park 17 Wing just off Ness Ave in the St. James area of Winnipeg

Alberta Aviation Museum 11410 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB, T5G 0X4

Atlantic Canada Aviation Museum 1658 Bedford Highway, Bedford, Nova Scotia, B4A-3X5

Avroland Memorial Military Museum — Campbellford, 226 Albert Street, in Campbellford, Ontario

Base Borden Military Museum (dropped their original website but one can go here for help) aircraft and tank in the adjacent General Worthington Memorial Park, Waterloo Rd, Borden [old url]

Bomber Command Museum of Canada Highway 2 and 17th Street, Nanton (Avro Lancaster, Bristol Blenheim, de Havilland Mosquito)

British Columbia Aviation Museum 1910 Norseman Road, Sidney, British Columbia

Canada Air, Land and Sea Museum (no web site) Toronto Markham Airport, Markham Ontario L3P3R1 (small but interesting handful of aircraft at this museum which is easy to find as it is on the airport’s single dead end road)

Canada Aviation & Space Museum 11 Aviation Parkway, Ottawa, Ontario, K1K 4R3 (rare Imperial German Air Service A.E.G. G.IV)

Canadian Air & Space Museum (closed currently and looking to relocate) Parc Downsview Park, 65 Carl Hall Road, Box 1, Toronto, ON M3K 2E1

Canadian Bushplane Heritage Centre 50 Pim Street Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario P6A 3G4

Canadian Forces Museum of Aerospace Defense just outside of Wallace Heights near Toronto, take Airport Rd north our of town to get to the museum

Canadian Historical Aircraft Association 600 Airport, Windsor, ON N8V 1A1

Canadian Museum of Flight Langley Airport, Hanger #3 – 5333 216th Street, Langley, British Columbia, V2Y 2N3

Canadian Strarfighter Museum (at the St. Andrews Airport and best to call first) 604 Club Road, St. Andrews, Manitoba R1A 3P5

Canadian Warplane Heritage Museum 9280 Airport Road, Mount Hope, Ontario, L0R 1W0

Comox Air Force Museum just south of the Comox Airport at Little River Rd and Military Row, Comox (Vancouver Island)

Great War Flying Museum 13961 McLaughlin Rd, Caledon, ON L7C 3L7, Canada

Greenwood Military Aviation Museum #161 Ward Street Greenwood, NS B0P 1N0

Hangar Museum, The 4629 McCall Way NE, Calgary, AB T2E 8A5 [formerly the Calgary Flight Museum]

Jet Aircraft Museum 2465 Aviation Lane–Unit #2, London, Ontario N5V 3Z9

Military Museums 4520 Crowchild Trail SW, Calgary, Alberta

Musée de L’Aviation de Montréal (Montreal Aviation Museum) Sainte Anne de Bellevue, Quebec H9X 1Y9 (located on the Macdonald campus of McGill University)

Musée de la Défense Aérienne de Bagotville 6513 Chemin Saint Anicet, La Baie, QC G7B 3N8

National Air Force Museum of Canada 220 RCAF Road, 8 Wing/CFB Trenton, Trenton (Halifax)

North Atlantic Aviation Museum 139 Bennett Drive, Gander, New Labrador

Reynolds Air Museum NW corner of the Wetaskiwin Airport, Wetaskiwin

Royal Aviation Museum of Western Canada Hangar T-2, 958 Ferry Road, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3H 0Y8

Shearwater Aviation Museum Caldwell RD/Hines Rd and Pleasant St/Main St, Halifax, NS B3K 2X0

<><><><>

Chile (1)

Museo Nacional Aeronautico y del Espacio Camino a Melipilla Nº 5.000, Los Cerrillos, Santiago

<><><><>

China (中国) (8)

Air park (no web site) near Longhua Temple, Shanghai China (31º 10′ 25″ N / 121º 27′ 12″ E)

Beijing Aviation Museum 北京航空博物馆 No. 37 Xueyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing

China Aviation Museum 中国航空博物馆 about 40 miles north of Beijing and located at Xiao Tang Hill (XiaoTangShan) in Chang Ping County — Bus No. 912 at Andingmen station, and get off at the gate of Aviation Museum directly — an unbelievable amount of aircraft on display

China North Industries Group Corporation (CNGC) Militatry Theme Park (no web site) Baotou City along Qinshan Rd at Fuqiang Rd

Qingdao Navy Museum 青岛海军博物馆 about 1 mile (1.6km) east of the Jiaoji Railway Terminal, Qingdao

Shanghai Aerospace Enthusiast’ Centre 上海航天中心 (no web site) No. 7900 Humin Rd, Shanghai 201102

Shenyang Aircraft Corp. Museum 沉阳飞机工业公司博物馆 (could not obtain a web site) near the southwestern corner of the Shenyang-Beiling Airport, Shenyang

Weifang World Kite Museum within city center on west bank of Bailang River (near Shenli E St and Qingnian Rd immediately south of the Rainbow Bridge -彩虹桥)Weifang

<><><><>

Colombia (2)

Colombian Air Force Aeronautical Park at Eldorado International Airport, Bogota

Colombian Air Force Air Space Museum at Eldorado Airport, Bogota

<><><><>

Croatia, Republic of (Republika Hrvatska) (1)

Home War Museum (could not obtain a web site) Route 6 in the southern part of town on east side of eastern branch of main river in Karlovac

<><><><>

Cuba (2)

Museo de la Revolución [broken link] Avenue del Misiones (Monserrate) y Penabrobe, Havana

Museo del Aire Avenida 212 y La Coronela, Cubanacan, Havana

<><><><>

Czech Republic (Česká Republika) (5)

Aviation Museum Kbely (Letecké Muzeum) at the Kbely Airport in Praha (Prague)

Aviation Museum Koněšín (Letecké Muzeum Koněšín and formerly at the airport in Olomouc) but now located related to the town of Koněšín as of 02 July 2016. The location is Areál Radar, Koněšín 675 02, Vys0čina, Czech Republic

Military History Institute Prague (VHU) U Památníku, 130 05, Praha 3

National Technical Museum (Národní Technické Muzeum) Kostelní 42, 170 78 Praha 7 (Prague)

Zruc Air Park & Military Museum along 180 (Tremošenská) just at Vresova Rd, south a tiny bit on Vresova, Zruc-Senec

<><><><>

Denmark (Danmark) (4)

Aalborg Defence and Garrison Museum Skydebanevej 22, 9000, Aalborg

Danmarks Flymuseum western end of the Stauning Airport along Lufthvensvej Rd, Østerby

Tekniske Museum Fabriksvej 25, 3000 Helsingør

Zeppelin and Garrison Museum Tøndor Gasværkvej 1, DK-6270 Tønder (artifacts)

<><><><>

Egypt (مَصْر ) (1)

National Military Museum (no web site found) Sharia Salah Salem al-Qala’a, Cairo (The Cairo Citadel, several aircraft exhibited on the museum grounds)

<><><><>

El Salvador (1)

Museo Nacional de Aviación Army Blvd at 9½km, Ilopango Air Force Base, Ilopango, San Salvador

<><><><>

Estonia (Eesti) (2)

Lennusadam Seaplane Harbour and Museum Seaplane Harbor, 17 Küti Street / 6 Vesilennuki Street, 10415 Tallinn (historic seaplane hangar, replica of first aircraft to attack with a torpedo)

Tartu Lennundumuuseum (Tartu Aviation Museum) just south of Lange

<><><><>

Finland (Suomi) (5)

Central Finland Aviation Museum Tikkakoskentie 125, 41160 Tikkakoski

Finnish Aviation Museum Tietotie 3, 01530, Vantaa

Hallinportti Aviation Museum eastern end of Halli Airport, on Haukilahdentie Rd, Järvensivu

Karhulan Ilmailukerho Aviation Museum at the terminal building of the uncontrolled airstrip, north of a point midway between Pyhtää and Hamina

Päijänne Tavastia Aviation Museum in the area of Vesivehmaa Airport, along the Urajärventie (313), Vesivehmaa

<><><><>

France (17)

Association des Amis du Musée de l’Aviation Légère de l’Armée de Terre et de l’Hélicoptère (Society of Friends of the French Army’s Aviation and Helicopter Museum) at the airfield in Dax — many aircraft

Concorde at Blagnac Airport (no web site), Avenue Jean Mermoz and Avenue Jean Monnet, Toulouse

Concorde at Charles de Gaulle Airport Paris (southeast of Terminal 1 and east of the control tower on Route des Peupliers)

Concorde and viewing area — Orly International Airport (no web site), Paris (several other aircraft as well, enter from the airports southern road, the N7 and exit east on the Route de Service E)

La Coupole Rue du Mont-à-Car (D210)- 62570 Helfaut (great museum and preserved WW II V-2 launch site, also V-1 and more on exhibit)

Mémorial-Normandie-Niemen Rue Raymond Phelip, 27700 Les Andelys — check the web site for hours and if it is opened but the town is charming and there are two well restored aircraft on posts, a Yak 1 and a Mirage F-1)

Musée Airborne — Sainte-Mère-Eglise 14 rue Eisenhower – 50480 Sainte-Mère-Eglise

Musée Aeronautique du Berry 31 rue Jean Louis Boncoeur, Touchay

Musée de l’Epopée et de l’Industrie Aéronautique (the Bétrancourt Collection) on Rue de l’Industrie near Av du Général Leclerc (D4929), Albert

Musée de la Resistance du Vercors museum in the north of the town Vassieux-en-Verors— DFS 230 Luftwaffe glider in the grave yard to the north

Musée de l’Air et de l’Espace Aéroport du Bourget BP 173, Aéroport du Bourget BP 173, 93352 Le Bourget Cedex

Musée de la Batterie de Merville le Batterie de Merville 9eme Bataillon des Parachutistes Brittanniques Place du 9ème Bataillon, 14810 Merville-Franceville

Musee des Avions de Chasse Château de Savigny-lès-Beaune, 21420 Savigny-lès-Beaune

Musée Européen de l’Aviation de Chasse Chemin Aerodrome, 26200 Montelmar

Musée Historique de l’Hydravion 332 Rue Louis Breguet 40600 Biscarrosse

Musée Régional d L’Air d’Angers Angers Loire Aéroport, 49140 Marcé, Angers

Utah Beach Musée du Débarquement Plage de la Madeleine, 50480 Sainte Marie du Mont

<><><><>

Germany (Deutschland) (28)

Aeronauticim Museum — Nordholz Peter-Strasser-Platz 3, Nordholz, D-27637

Albert Sammt Zeppelin Museum [broken link] Hauptstraße 52, Niederstetten (traces the life of this airship aviator)

Allied Museum Clayallee 135 14195 Berlin

Aviation Pioneer Gustav Weißkopf Museum Plan 6, D-91578 Leutershausen

Deutsches Museum — Flugwerft Effnerstraße 18, D-85764 Oberschleißheim

Deutsches Technikmuseum Berlin Trebbiner Str. 9, 10963 Berlin-Kreuzberg, Berlin

Dornier Museum Friedrichshafen at the Friedrichshafen Airport, Friedrichshafen

EADS – Willy Messerschmitt Aircraft Museum [broken link] western side of Manching Airport

Flughafen München (Munich Airpark) München (Munich) Airport

Flugzeugmuseum Hermeskeil Habersberg 1, Hunsrückhöhenstr. (B327), 54411 Hermeskeil II

Gerhard Neumann Museum Niederalteich Josef Voggenreiter, Hengersberger Str. 5, D-94557 Niederalteich

Hamburg Finkenwerder Airport Airpark (no web site) Kreetslag 10, 21129 Hamburg (near NW corner of airport)

Historisch Technische Museum Im Kraftwerk, 17449 Peenemünde

Hubschraubermuseum (Helicopter Museum) Sable-Platz 6, 31675 Buckeburg

Josef Kock Historiche Flugzuege Grossenhain Airport, Grossenhain

Ju 52 Halle (Ju52 Hangar of TraditionsgemeinschaftLufttransport Wunstorf e. V.) NW corner of Wunstorf Airport on K332, Wunstorf

Luftfahrt und Technik Museumspark in Merseburg Kastanienpromenade 50, Meresburg (SE corner of Meresberg Airfield)

Luftfahrtmuseum Finow Germany NW corner of Finow Airport, Finowfurt

Luftwaffenmuseum der Bundeswehr Berlin Gatow Bundesgeschäftsstelle, Postfach 450 222, 12172 Berlin

Mercedes Benz Museum Mercedes-Jellinek-Straße and Emil-Kessler-Straße (Mercedes-Benz WerkeMercedesstaße), Stuttgart — along with the cars there is a Klemm L-20B1

Militärhistorisches Museum [broken link] Parkplatz am Museum, Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel: Linien 7, 8, 91, Haltestelle Militärhistorisches Museum (wird angesagt), Dresden

Royal Air Force Museum Laarbruch-Weeze on Flughafen-Ring near Brückerhöfe at Laarbruch RAF Airport near Weeze

Sinsheim Auto & Technik Museum exit 33 Sinsheim or exit 34 Sinsheim-Steinsfurt

Teknik Museum “Hugo Junkers” Dessau Kühnauer Straße 161a, 06846 Dessau-Roßlau

Technik Museum Speyer Am Technik Museum, D-67346 Speyer

Zeppelin Museum Bahnhof train station, Friedrichshafen

Zeppelin Museum Meersburg Schlossplatz 8, Meersburg (artifacts)

Zeppelin and Garrison Museum Tøndor Gasværkvej 1, Tøndor

Zeppelin-Museum Zeppelinheim Captain-Lehmann-Str. 2, 63263 Neu-Isenburg (Zeppelinheim) — ¼-hull section of an LZ 10 airship

<><><><>

Greece (Ελλάδα) (2)

Elefsis Heritage Park (could not find a web site) on the south west side of Elefsis Airfield, Sarantapotamou and Leoforos Gelas, Asypyrgos, not far to the northwest of Athens

Hellenic Air Force Museum within the Dekeleia Air Base which is next to Tatoi Airport in Thrakomakedones on the outskirts of Athens to the northeast — reservations are required for entry

<><><><><>

Honduras (1)

Museo del Aire (no web site) SE corner of Toncontin International Airport, Tegucigalpa

<><><><>

Hungary (Magyarország) (4)

Ferihegy Airport Airpark on the western side of the airport’s entrance, Budapest

Hungary Aviation Museum (no web site) Zichy Mihály utca and Istvántelki utca, Budapest

Magyar Repüléstörténeti Múzeum a short distance northeast of Rakoczifalva Airport at the 442 (Karinthy Frigyes utca) and Kilián György utca, Rákócziújfalu

RepülőMúzeum NW area of the Szolnoki airport (Rakoczifalva) on Karinthy Frigyes utca (Road 442) in Szolnoki (dozens of aircraft)

Zánka Military Park (Haditechnikai Park) (no web site) east of Zánka on Hwy 71 (Balatoni Way), Zánka

<><><><>

Iceland (Ísland) (1)

Iceland Aviation Museum (Flugsafn Íslands) at Akureyri Airport, Hringteigi 5, 600 Akureyri

<><><><>

India (3)

Heritage Centre and Aerospace Museum [broken link] Varthur Road, Bangalore, Karnataka

Indian Air Force Museum Palam Air Force Station, New Delhi – 110010 (over 40 aircraft from over 5 counties of manufacture)

Naval Aviation Museum at Goa along the Vasco-Bogmalo road, six kilometres from the city of Vasco-da-Gama

<><><><>

Indonesia (1)

Museum Dirgantara Mandala Yogyakarta (Indonesia Air Force Museum) Jl. Kol. Sugiono, Lanud Adisutjipto, Yogyakarta (several aircraft, including WW II era from the Allies and Japan)

<><><><>

Iran (1)

Tehran Air Park (no web site found) north of Mehr Abad Airport, on Tehran-Karaj Highway between Bolvar-e-Sharqi-ye-Estadiyom-e-Azadi and Sattaro Highway, Tehran

<><><><>

Ireland (3)

Atlantic Air Adventures Aviation Museum Link Road, Shannon, County Clare

Foynes Flying Boat Museum on road N69 in Foynes

Irish Aer Corps Museum and Heritage Project (by appointment) Casement Aerodrome, Baldonnel, Dublin 22

<><><><>

Israel (ישראל) (2)

Haifa Airport air park (no web site) at the Haifa Airport Terminal

Israel Air Force Museum on the 2375 (Derech Joe Yosef Alon Rd), Be’er Sheva (Beer Sheba)

<><><><>

Italy (Italia) (10)

Fondazione Jonathan Collection Campo Volo F. Baracca Via Fra Giocondo 8/A, Nervesa della Battaglia (many flying aircraft including the large biplane bomber Caproni Ca.3 [Ca.33 as renamed after WW I])

Italian Air Force Museum look for signs in the town of Vigna di Valle

Grosseto Base Museum (no web site) Grosseto Air Force Base, Grosseto

Museo dell’Aeronautica Gianni Caproni Via Lidorno, 3, 38123, Trento TN

Museo dell’aria Castello di San Pelagio Via San Pelagio, 34 – 35020 Due Carrare (several aircraft displayed along the grounds of a castle)

Museo Gottard Park – Museo Mezzi di Transport Via Sempione 172, Castelletto Sopra Ticino

Museum of Science & Technology Leonardo da Vinci Via San Vittore 21, Milan

Parco e Museo del Volo Volandia 21019 Case, Nuove Somma Lombardo (at Aeroporto Malpensa)

Museo Piana delle Orme Strada Migliara 43 Mezza south of Strada Trasversale, Latina

Parco Tematico dell’Aviazione & Museo along Via S. Aquilina between Rimini Italy and San Marino

<><><><>

Japan (日本) (22)

Aichi Aviation Museum 愛知航空博物館 Central Japan International Airport 中部国際空港, Nagoya 名古屋

Bansei Tokkō Museum 万世の特攻博物館 (no web site found) Minamisatsuma 南さつま just south of the inlet — remains of float plane Zero

Chiran Special Attack Peace Kannon Shrine 知覧特別攻撃平和観音神社 (no web site found) Minamikyushu 南九州 (WW II aircraft and others)

Chitose Sky Dream Museum Chitose Airport Terminal, Chitose Airport, Chitose (several excellent models)

Harada Collection 原田コレクション 401-0320 Huzi Sakura highland village in Yamanashi Prefecture County Narusawa 山梨県郡鳴沢で401-0320 Huziさくら高原村

JASDF Hamamatsu Air Park 航空自衛隊浜松エアーパーク (no web site found) Hamamatsu 浜松

Kakamigahara Aerospace Museum 各務原航空宇宙博物館 (no web site found) western end of Gifu Airport 岐阜空港, Kakamigahara 各務原市

Kanoya Naval Air Base Museum* 鹿屋海軍航空基地の博物館 Kanoya 鹿屋 — [broken link] just north of the military base dozens of aircraft including the rare Kawanishi “Emily” Kawanishi 川西 H8K 二式大型飛行艇

Misawa Aviation & Science Museum 三沢航空科学博物館 eastern side of the air base in Misawa 三沢 — notably has a replica of “Miss Veedol”

Mitsubishi Komaki Plant Museum 三菱小牧工場博物館 1200, Higashi-tanaka, Komaki 小牧

Mix Lek Mountain Park South 南レク馬瀬山公園内にあり [broken link] near Ainin on Route 320 (has a conserved Kawanishi N1K-1 Shiden 紫電 with bent prop)

Modern Transportation Museum 現代の交通博物館 [broken link] Namiyoke 3 chome, Minato-ku, Osaka 波除3丁目東京都港区、大阪 — models of aircraft designs by Chūhachi Ninomiya and an Me-163 engine

Museum of Aeronautical Sciences 航空科学博物館 (no web site found) southern end of Narita International Airport 成田国際空港, Tokyo 東京

Nasu War Museum 那須戦争博物館 [broken link] (Army Type 95 fighter and possibly a Ki 15)

Shiden Kai Exibition Hall [紫電改（しでんかい）展示館] 5688 Mishohirajo, Ainan, Minamiuwa District, Ehime 798-4110 (restored Kawanishi NJ1-K Shiden, Allied code name George)

Tachiarai Peace Memorial Museum* (no web site found) 大刀洗平和記念館 Tachiarai 大刀洗 — sole Nakajima Type 97 fighter “Nate” (Nakajima 隼 Ki-27 九七式戦闘機) also a T-33 and many artifacts

Tokorozawa Aviation Museum 所沢航空発祥記念館オフィシャルサイ 359-0042 Tokorozawa Aviation Museum, Namiki, Tokorozawa 359-0042所沢航空博物館、並木、所沢 — the birthplace of Japanese aviation

Yamato Museum at the waterfront along the 242, Kure 呉 — Mitsubishi Type 0 “Zero”

Yasakuni Shrine War Memorial Museum Tokyo (a Mitsubishi A6M5 Type O “Zero”, a replica Ohka and a rare Yokosuka 横須賀 D4Y Suisei彗星 — Comet, Allied code name “Judy”)

Yokaren Museum Oita 大分 — unknown type of aviation displays

<><><><>

Laos (Lao People’s Democratic Republic ສາທາລະນະລັດ ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ ປະຊາຊົນລາວ) (1)

Lao Peoples Army History Museum (no website found) Ban Phonkheng Vientiane (many aircraft on exhibit outside, Russian and American made)

<><><><>

Latvia (Latvija) (1)

Skulte Riga Soviet Air Museum Riga International Airport, Riga

<><><><>

Lithuania (Lietuva) (1)

Lithuanian Aviation Museum Veiveriu 132, LT-46338, Kaunas

<><><><>

Malaysia (1)

Royal Malaysian Air Force Museum* (Closed though the web site does not reflect the fact so call first!) RMAF Base Kuala Lumpur, Jalan Lapangan Terbang Lama, 50460 Kuala Lumpur

<><><><>

Malta (2)

Malta Aviation Museum Ta’Qali ATD 4000

National War Museum Old Drill Hall of Lower Ft. St. Elmo, Valletta (rare Gloster Sea Gladiator)

Rolls-Royce Heritage Trust

Rolls-Royce Heritage Trust—Bristol [broken link] [by appointment only: contact +44 (0) 1332 823888 or jayne.rogers@rolls-royce.com] The Sir Roy Fedden Heritage Center houses the Bristol Branch Collection with its excellent assemblage of Bristol engines as well as immense archive. Lectures and events generally on Monday evenings September–April.

Rolls-Royce Heritage Trust—Coventry & Antsy Branch [broken link][by appointment only: +44 (0) 1332 823888 or jayne.rogers@rolls-royce.com] Emphasizing the Armstrong-Siddely engines of all types ranging from 1904 vintage motor cars to radial aero engines to turbojets to the Maybach V-16 locomotive diesel and much more. Workshops at Derby on Wednesdays and workshops at Antsy Wednesday through Friday.

Rolls-Royce Heritage Trust—Derby and Hucknall Branch [broken link][by appointment only: at Derby Monday and Friday mornings contact +44 (0) 1332 241610 or +44 (0) 1332 241167 and at Hucknal Wednesday mornings contact +44 (0) 115 9642 264] [heritage.trust@Rolls-Royce.com] The collection in Derby has one of the world’s largest engine collection at 200+ which is the history of Rolls-Royce and its ancestor companies as well as absorbed companies. The collection at Hucknall has a smaller collection of engines as well as models used at the testing centre there. The Heritage Centre on Osmaston Road details the history of Rolls-Royce and absorbed companies alone with the history of propulsion on land, sea and air.

Romney Marsh Wartime Collection Ivychurch Road, Brenzett, Romney Marsh, Kent TN29 OEE (Vampire and Canberra plus bomb disposal equipment as well as a Barnes Wallis design dambuster bomb from Operation Upkeep — also restoring an almost rare manned version of the V-1 “Buzz Bomb”)

Royal Logistics Corps Museum* (better known as the RLC Museum) The Princess Royal Barracks, Deep Cut, Surrey GU16 1RW

Ruskin Museum Yewdale Road Coniston, Cumbria LA21 8DU (display of a wrecked Halifax bomber)

Science & Industry Museum Liverpool Road, Castlefield, Manchester, M3 4FP (five aircraft)

Second World War Aircraft Preservation Society (closed October 2009) northeast corner of Lasham Airfield, 6 miles north of Alton, Hampshire

Seething Control Tower Museum (also the home of the 448th Bombardment Group Collection) Toad Lane, Seething, Norfolk NR35 2EQ

Shoreham Aircraft Museum 13 High Street Shoreham, Sevenoaks, Kent TN14 7TB

Shuttleworth Collection Shuttleworth (Old Warden) Aerodrome, N Biggleswade, Bedfordshire, SG18 9EP

Solent Sky Museum* (formerly known as the Southhampton Hall of Aviation) Albert Rd South, Southhampton, Hants S014 3FR — many aircraft but notably a Supermarine S.6 (predecessor to the Spitfire), Short Bros. Sandringham, Supermarine Seagull and Saunders Roe SR.A/1 (one of only two seaplane jet fighetr designs to fly)

Solway Aviation Museum Aviation House Carlisle, Cumbria CA6 4NW

South Yorkshire Aircraft Museum Dakota Way, Airborne Road, Doncaster, South Yorkshire DN4 7FB (they advise use of Dn$ 7NW for GPS nav input)

“Stratford Aircraft Collection“ (no web site) located on the southeastern corner of Long Marston Airport with the entrance on Campden Rd. — the nearest town is within a few miles and is Long Marston, Stratford-Upon-Avon — this is not a formal collection and the facility appears to be closed with most of the collection of military aircraft having been distributed to other museums but a few of the larger aircraft remain but are not maintained.

Spitfire and Hurricane Memorial and Museum immediately north of Kent International Airport on Manston Rd, Ramsgate, Kent (neighboring the RAF Manston History Museum)

Sywell Aviation Museum at Sywell Aerodrome, Sywell Village, Northhapmtonshire — a Vampire cockpit and loads or artifacts from aircraft accidents that occurred during WW II in the vicinity of the aerodrome, as well as a WW II German 500kg bomb.
